Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory10.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "Kamui's greatsword swings wildly inside the crowd of enemies, bashing the corrupted into the air."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Behold the great Kamui! And his powerful signature move!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His blade lands on the head of a Corrupted following his battle cry, bringing this battle to an end.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Puff. I'd say mission accomplished, Capt!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'That should be all the Corrupted we could find in this area.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hurray! We've earned ourselves a little break now, haven't we?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Not until we finish the battle report... What can you tell me about the difference between the Elite Corrupted you fought and our regular enemies, Kamui?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Erm... Capt, feel free to write it down yourselves. You probably knew what it was already when you asked me, so what use is my answer anyway?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "...I'm trying to train you on something other than combat.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Fine. I fought eleven of them, and they didn't act weird or anything.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Chrome is filing the report no Strike Hawk member is willing to do, recording everything that has happened since their mission started.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "By the way, Capt, if you've been doing that report the whole time, did you write down what's happened recently?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Of course. Everything the Strike Hawk has done is well recorded on this portable terminal, and a copy of it goes to the Ministry of War when we're back on Babylonia.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Why are you asking? Something on your mind?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I just suddenly realized that it has been quite eventful recently, hasn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'First, it was the infiltration on the Nighter... By the way, we should get a dress that properly fits next time. The one I wore was such a hassle.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Ideally, something that separates the top from the bottom part of the dress. It'll be much easier for me to get out of it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Does that mean you want to do it again...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "And then it was the battle in the Kowloong Metropolis. Didn't expect that outcome.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'The Ascendants became much more active afterward, and our squad has been forced to stay on Earth for the long haul as well.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I wish we could convince the Ascendants like how we had done with Kowloong. There wouldn't have been so many sacrifices...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'But that\'s impossible. As long as the Punishing Virus remains a "virus," nothing about it can be changed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'But Camu took the... He...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "We can't expect everyone to turn into what he is. And I don't think anyone would want another Transcendant if possible.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Not taking a side is a worrisome stance.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'After that...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "There were those fights that were so epic that they've changed the world order...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "But we've survived all of them, relying on our hard work and our companions—hmm, companion?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "What's wrong, Capt?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Speaking of companions, I just realized that... Wanshi's not here? Wasn't he with us just a while ago?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh, I buried him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: '...You buried him?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'That guy was like, "you and Capt can probably handle this anyway," and then he found a spot to sleep, and he had the nerve to tell me to tuck him in.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'So I tucked him in real good, with a lot of bricks and a little sign that says, "Here lies Wanshi, beloved friend..."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Oh, a message! Maybe it's Wanshi asking for help?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "What's up, Wanshi? Where are you now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh, what an interesting idea!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "In that case, let's connect to the satellite with our portable device. Go wake Wanshi up, Kamui.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Connecting to the satellite!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Wait—did you hear a word I just said?', 4: '2'}
